title: Will take up PM post only on conditions laid by me - Sajith writes to GR
body_lines: Leader of Opposition Sajith Premadasa in a letter addressed to President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has said no one from SJB will be a part of the new government.
"However I am willing to become the Prime Minister in a government of my own subjected to  conditions which I have laid out on May 12 2022," he said in the letter.

"I did not give my consent to become the premier on May 12 as you have suggested in your letter as I always and was always willing to  take up the premiership with conditions such as your resignation and constitutional reforms," he said.(Yohan Perera)
